onboarding.grettings-text: Uncover the deep meaning of your dreams.
onboarding.personalize-explanation-gender: We’ll personalize your interpretations based on your gender.
onboarding.name-question-explanation: We’ll personalize your interpretations based on your name.

new-screens.grow-description: Be one of the first to rate us!
new-screens.short-explanation-description-part: MyDream is an app that helps you record, analyze, and interpret your dreams using AI technology.

home.description: The better you describe your dream, the better the interpretation will be.
home.permission-to-access-microphone-was-deni: Permission to access the microphone was denied.
home.enable-microphone-permission: Please enable microphone access in Settings.
home.record-a-few-more: Try recording at least a few seconds.
home.your-dreams-displayed: Your dreams will be displayed here!

sub-block.continue-dream-one-tap: Continue your dream with one tap.

dream-input.placeholder: Describe your dream here. If you prefer, press the keyboard microphone to speak.
dream-input.audio-loading:
Transcribing your audio...
just a moment
dream-input.enter-description: Enter a description of your dream
dream-input.more-words-needed: Please enter at least three words.
dream-input.analyzing-loading: Analyzing your dream… please wait a moment.
dream-input.reached-limit: You have reached the daily limit of {{limit}} dreams. Next generation available at: {{time}}

interpretations.esoteric-desc:
Hidden signs and soul messages.
Symbols guide inner awareness.
interpretations.scientific-desc:
Dreams reflect brain activity.
They reveal stress and emotion.
interpretations.self-development-desc:
Dreams mirror growth and change.
They help unlock potential.
interpretations.freudian-desc:
Dreams expose unconscious desire.
Repressed emotions rise to the surface.
interpretations.jungian-desc:
Archetypal symbols light the way.
Dreams guide the journey to self-wholeness.

dream-page.delete-warning: Are you sure you want to delete this dream?
dream-page.lose-data-warning: This data will be lost forever.

settings-page.name: Name
settings-page.feedback-important: Your feedback is important to us.
settings-page.log-out-warn: Are you sure you want to log out and lose all your data?

card.you-need-to-complete: You need to complete all dream analyses to get more insights.
card.title: Dream Analysis
